properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 4:07AM PST until February 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions,
including during the morning commute on Monday. Total snow
accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with localized amounts up to 4
inches in the higher terrain around Landers and Johnson Valley.

* WHERE...The High Desert of San Bernardino County.

* WHEN...6 PM today to 10 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at
times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

For road condition information in California...enter
8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or
9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST MONDAY
